records.question: How do I reset my password?
records.answer: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. We'll send a password reset link to your registered email address which will be valid for 24 hours.

records.question: What are your business hours?
records.answer: Our physical stores are open Monday through Friday from 9am to 8pm, Saturday from 10am to 6pm, and Sunday from 12pm to 5pm. Our online customer service is available 24/7.

records.question: Do you offer a student discount?
records.answer: Yes, we offer a 15% discount for students with a valid student ID. This discount can be applied both in-store and online by verifying through our student verification partner.
